product_name: oZoboards SUP32 Stand Up Paddleboard and Paddle - 9' 6"
long_description: Your ticket to a new sport, the 9 ft. 6 in. oZoboards SUP32 stand up paddleboard with paddle features a soft outer skin for comfort and a 31.5 in. width for excellent stability. EPS Core with triple stringers provides high strength and excellent rigidity; soft skin provides comfort for all skill levels of riders. The raised platform deck provides extra flotation and solid grip when paddling, kneeling and standing. 9 ft. 6 in. length is easy to turn in waves, and it offers plenty of stability for flatwater exploration. Optimal for riders 140 - 220 lbs., but rated to 300 lbs. for riders of higher ability. The 9 ft. 6 in. oZoboards SUP32 stand up paddleboard includes an adjustable paddle.
short_description: Your ticket to a new sport, the 9 ft. 6 in. oZoboards SUP32 stand up paddleboard with paddle features a soft outer skin for comfort and a 31.5 in. width for excellent stability.
